languages.text: Судьба спутника Вольного Торговца, брошенного на неизвестном мире в бездонной, нарушающей законы реальности пропасти, неведома. Среди пустотников бродил слух о странной тени, появляющейся на палубах во время варп-переходов и повторяющей имя "Валанциус", но нет оснований верить этим сплетням.

The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-perverting pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during warp jumps. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.
languages.original_text: Судьба спутника Вольного Торговца, брошенного на неизвестном мире в бездонной, нарушающей законы реальности пропасти, неведома. Среди пустотников бродил слух о странной тени, появляющейся на палубах во время варп-переходов и повторяющей имя "Валанциус", но нет оснований верить этим сплетням.

traits.locale_text: The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-bending pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during passages through warp. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-bending pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during passages through warp. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-perverting pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during passages through warp. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-perverting pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during passages through warp. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-perverting pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during warp jumps. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-perverting pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during warp jumps. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

languages.text: 行商浪人的同伴被留在某个无名世界之中。在那扭曲现实的无底深渊中，那位同伴的命运不得而知。船员们称，在他们进行亚空间跳跃时，甲板上会出现一个古怪的影子，这个影子一遍又一遍地念着“瓦兰修斯”这个名字。不过，这样的谣言不过只是无稽之谈罢了。
languages.original_text: The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-perverting pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during warp jumps. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的同伴被留在某个无名世界之中。在那扭曲现实的无底深渊中，那位同伴的命运不得而知。船员们称，在他们穿越亚空间的时候，甲板上会出现一个古怪的影子，这个影子一遍又一遍地念着“瓦兰修斯”这个名字。不过，这样的谣言不过只是无稽之谈罢了。

languages.text: Es ist nicht bekannt, was aus der Begleitung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} geworden ist. Man weiß nur, dass sie auf einer namenlosen Welt in einem bodenlosen, die Realität pervertierenden Loch zurückgelassen wurde. Raumfahrer sprechen von einem merkwürdigen Schatten, der während Warpsprüngen auf ihren Decks erscheint. Der Schatten sagt immer wieder den Namen "Valancius". Aber es gibt keinen Grund, solchen Gerüchten Glauben zu schenken.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-perverting pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during warp jumps. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

traits.locale_text: Es ist nicht bekannt, was aus der Begleitung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} geworden ist. Man weiß nur, dass sie auf einer namenlosen Welt in einem bodenlosen, die Realität pervertierenden Loch zurückgelassen wurde. Raumfahrer sprechen von einem merkwürdigen Schatten, der während Reisen durch den Warp auf ihren Decks erscheint. Der Schatten sagt immer wieder den Namen "Valancius". Aber es gibt keinen Grund, solchen Gerüchten Glauben zu schenken.

languages.text: Le sort du compagnon {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, abandonné sur un monde sans nom au fond d'une fosse abyssale défiant la réalité, reste inconnu. Les cosmomarins évoquent une ombre étrange qui apparaît sur leurs ponts lors des sauts Warp et ne cesse de répéter le nom « Valancius », mais il n'y a aucune raison de croire de telles rumeurs.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-perverting pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during warp jumps. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

traits.locale_text: Le sort du compagnon {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, abandonné sur un monde sans nom au fond d'une fosse abyssale défiant la réalité, reste inconnu. Les cosmomarins évoquent une ombre étrange qui apparaît sur leurs ponts lors des traversées du Warp et ne cesse de répéter le nom « Valancius », mais il n'y a aucune raison de croire telles rumeurs.

languages.text: Se desconoce su destino después de su abandono en un pozo que distorsiona la realidad, en un mundo sin nombre. Los viajeros del vacío hablan de una extraña sombra que aparece en sus cubiertas durante los saltos de disformidad y no deja de repetir el apellido «Valancius»... aunque no hay motivos para creer esos rumores.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-perverting pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during warp jumps. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

traits.locale_text: Se desconoce su destino después de su abandono en un pozo que distorsiona la realidad, en un mundo sin nombre. Los viajeros del vacío hablan de una extraña sombra que aparece en sus cubiertas durante su paso por la disformidad y no deja de repetir el apellido «Valancius»... aunque no hay motivos para creer esos rumores.

languages.text: 底なしの現実を蝕むピットの中の名もなき世界に取り残された自由開拓者の仲間の運命はわからない。ヴォイズマンたちは、ワープジャンプ中にデッキに現れる奇妙な影について語る。その影は「ヴァランシウス」という名を何度も何度も口にするという。しかし、そのような噂を信じる理由はない。
languages.original_text: The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-perverting pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during warp jumps. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

traits.locale_text: 底なしの現実を蝕むピットの中の名もなき世界に取り残された自由開拓者の仲間の運命はわからない。ヴォイズマンたちは、ワープジャンプ中にデッキに現れる奇妙な影について語る。その影は「ヴァランシウス」という名を何度も何度も口にするという。しかし、そのような噂を信じる理由はない。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in, isimsiz bir dünyadaki gerçekliği saptıran dipsiz kuyuda terk edilen yoldaşına ne olduğu bilinmiyor. Uçsuz erleri, öte sıçrama sırasında güvertelerinde ortaya çıkan tuhaf bir gölgeden bahsederdi. Gölge, sürekli olarak "Valancius" lafını tekrarlıyor dense de elbette bu tip söylentilere inanılması salık edilmez.
languages.original_text: The fate of the Rogue Trader's companion, left on a nameless world in a bottomless reality-perverting pit, is unknown. Voidsmen speak of a strange shadow that appears on their decks during warp jumps. The shadow says the name "Valancius" over and over again. But there are no reasons to believe such rumours.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in isimsiz bir dünyadaki gerçekliği saptıran dipsiz kuyuya terk edilen yoldaşına ne olduğu bilinmiyor. Uçsuz erleri, öte sıçramalar sırasında güvertelerinde ortaya çıkan tuhaf bir gölgeden bahsederlerdi. Gölge sürekli olarak "Valancius" sözünü tekrarlıyor deniyordu ancak elbette bu tip söylentilere inanmak için herhangi bir sebep yok.
